ygData.subject: Re: (unknown)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thank you for sharing this. I m about to make a trade with someone in the next few days and now I m terrified!!! Good luck on getting it resolved. Sinarya
ygData.messageBody:
--- kale eusi <kaleusi@...> wrote:
> it. Why you ask have I posted
> this information everywhere? I do it simply to
> warn everyone! Be extremely
> careful who you trade with or you'll end up
> like me - 7500pp in the hole,
> and no item to show for it! So now, I sit here
> on pins and needles, waiting
> and hoping that the server didn't screw up and
> not save the data, so that I
> may have my items/cash restored!
>
> Jarlax T`Kaedra
> Highly Agitated SK of the 38th Rank
> Bertoxxulous
>

Thank you for sharing this. I'm about to make a
trade with someone in the next few days and now
I'm terrified!!! Good luck on getting it
resolved.

Sinarya
6th DE Necromancer
Veeshan


=====
* Selene *
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"All my life I've told people that they can live without the gods... Now I guess we'll find out." Hercules <Xena: Warrior Princess> 'God Fearing Child'

"Ten of your American dollars says God is a woman." Emilia
"Well, that explains why we're always trying to please her and nothing we ever do is good enough!" Jack <Jack of All Trades> 'Floundering Fathers'
